summary: All five new Colt-themed games (Colt Pong, Colt Tetris, Colt Breakout, Colt Asteroids, Colt Racer) have been implemented as canvas-based components and wired into GamesTab.tsx. The implementation appears to satisfy all REQ-15 acceptance criteria: GlassCard entries for each game, full-screen view with back button, score counters, restart mechanics, neon/cyberpunk aesthetic, Colt in every game name, and no regressions to existing games.
